sentences.sentence: Joe froze against him, ejaculating he thought, then suddenly was gone.
sentences.translation: 乔冻结对抗他，突然说出他想，然后突然不见了。

sentences.sentence: You just might have him ejaculating in his pants before you even get them off!
sentences.translation: 没等你表演完，可能他已经射在裤子里了！

sentences.sentence: He lit the dining-room lamp, got out a cigar, and began pacing the room, ejaculating.
sentences.translation: 他点燃了餐室的灯，拿出一支雪茄，开始在房间里踱方步，一面叹息。
